overview:
Chief Executive of Vinopic Wines

“Navarro’s previous media career has given him the skills; the oratory, the reassurance, the ease - all vital to any successful e-retailer. The man’s quite clearly a pro… The qualities that successful entrepreneurs seem to share are clearly present in Navarro; hard work, dedication, intuition (to name but a few).” Alice Kahrmann, Editor - The Good Web Guide, May 2012

“Santiago proved to be a well-presented, personable Mediterranean… Santiago is very impressive in person and clearly an intelligent and thoughtful businessman.” Tom Lewis, The Cambridge Wine Blogger, November 2011

degrees.subject: International Finance
degrees.institution: Amsterdam Business School, University of Amsterdam
